dublin_core.dcvalue: We introduce a system that tracks patients in a Mass Casualty Incident MCI using active RFID triage tags and mobile anchor points DM tracks carried by the paramedics The system does not involve any fixed deployment of the localization devices while maintaining a low cost triage tag The localization accuracy is comparable to GPS systems without incurring the cost of providing a GPS based device to every patient in the disaster scene
Conference proceedings : ... Annual International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. Annual Conference
Scalable patients tracking framework for mass casualty incidents.
